title: Slađan Mijatović
text:
Slađan Mijatović (; born 23 May 1994) is a <a href="Serbia">Serbia</a>n <a href="Association%20football">football</a> <a href="Defender%20%28association%20football%29">defender</a>, playing for <a href="OFK%20Ba%C4%8Dka">Bačka</a>.
Club career.
Mijatović has started playing in football school "VUK", and later moved to <a href="OFK%20Beograd">OFK Beograd</a> youth academy. He started his senior career in the <a href="Serbian%20League%20Belgrade">Serbian League Belgrade</a> side <a href="FK%20Dor%C4%87ol">Dorćol</a>, and later he also played with <a href="FK%20%C5%BDeleznik">Železnik</a>. In the winter break off-season <a href="2013%E2%80%9314%20Serbian%20SuperLiga">2013–14</a>, he signed with <a href="FK%20Jagodina">Jagodina</a>. He made his professional debut for <a href="FK%20Jagodina">Jagodina</a> in <a href="Serbian%20SuperLiga">Serbian SuperLiga</a> home match versus <a href="Red%20Star%20Belgrade">Red Star Belgrade</a> on 1 March 2014. During the time he played under contract with <a href="FK%20Jagodina">Jagodina</a>, Mijatović was loaned on dual registration with the satellite club <a href="OFK%20Tabane%20Trgova%C4%8Dki">Tabane Trgovački</a>. In 2017, he terminated a contract with <a href="FK%20Jagodina">Jagodina</a> and left the club as a <a href="free%20agent">free agent</a>. Later he moved to <a href="FK%20Jedinstvo%20Para%C4%87in">Jedinstvo Paraćin</a>.
